metadata.title: CVE-2022-24566 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In Checkmk <=2.0.0p19 fixed in 2.0.0p20 and Checkmk <=1.6.0p27 fixed in1.6.0p28, the title of a Predefined condition is not properly escaped whenshown as condition, which can result in Cross Site Scripting (XSS).

criterions.comment: check-mk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
